title: At Derek Chauvin's murder trial, echoes of guilt over George Floyd's death
description: The 19-year-old cashier who suspected George Floyd had handed him a counterfeit bill said Wednesday he still feels guilt for Floyd's death under the knee of a former Minneapolis police officer.

title: 'Oh my God': Trial goes to break after witness breaks down on stand
description: Charles McMillian, who was one of the first bystanders on the scene as George Floyd was being taken into custody in May 2020, broke down on the stand during his testimony in the trial of Derek Chauvin after watching graphic footage of Floyd's arrest.

title: Mystery at sacred Christian site explained
description: Three-dimensional imaging was used to shed light on the origin of thousands of mysterious crosses carved into the walls of Jerusalem's Church of the Holy Sepulchre.

title: Super Mario Bros fans are panicking over rumors that Mario is going to die
description: Grab the tissues.

title: Bodycam footage shows police officers berating 5-year-old boy for leaving school
description: Body camera footage from police officers in Maryland show them berate and threaten a 5-year-old boy after he left school. CNN's Athena Jones reports.

title: This little-known Japanese fruit now has a cult following
description: When Jerry Callahan had his first bite of a Sumo Citrus fruit about nine years ago, he knew he'd tried something special. "This is going to go crazy," he thought.

title: A meteorite exploded in the air above Antarctica 430,000 years ago
description: Tiny particles recovered from the summit of a mountain in Antarctica are clues that a meteorite more than 100 yards wide exploded in the sky 430,000 years ago, sending a fireball of vaporized extraterrestrial material to the icy surface, according to new research.

title: Italy expels two Russian officials over espionage case
description: Italy is expelling two Russian officials in connection with an espionage case, Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio said Wednesday on his Facebook page.

title: Virgin Galactic unveils mirror-coated space plane known as 'Spaceship III'
description: Virgin Galactic, the space tourism firm that hopes to send its first customers to space next year, unveiled a new spacecraft design on Tuesday. The sleek new space plane has a reflective coating that the company calls "mirror-like," and says will add to space tourists' experience.

title: Switzerland's female soldiers can finally stop wearing men's underwear
description: For the first time ever, the Swiss army is going to give its female recruits women's underwear, as the force looks to attract more women to its ranks.

title: Airplane cabin concepts that could change flying: Crystal Cabin Awards 2020
description: It's been a strange period for aviation and, for many of us, it's been over a year since we actually saw the inside of an airplane cabin.

title: New discoveries fundamentally change the picture of human evolution in Africa
description: Early humans were just as innovative inland as on the coast, new research from the southern Kalahari Desert in Africa suggests.

title: Vietnam sentences flight attendant for spreading coronavirus
description: A court in Vietnam handed a two-year suspended jail term to a Vietnam Airlines flight attendant on Tuesday after finding him guilty of breaking Covid-19 quarantine rules and spreading the virus to others, police said.

title: 'The Candy Book' and 5 other reads that defy 'outdated rules of gender'
description: Transgender, gender-nonconforming, nonbinary, crossdressing and androgynous people, and drag queens, inspired and contributed to the fashion industry for years.

title: Russia registers world's first Covid-19 vaccine for animals
description: As governments across the globe scramble to secure Covid-19 vaccine doses for humans, Russia has registered the world's first coronavirus vaccine for animals, state media outlet TASS reported Wednesday.

title: UK government report on racial disparities slammed as a 'whitewash'
description: A highly anticipated report from a commission set up by the UK government to look into racial disparities in the country has been described as a "whitewash" by campaigners after it stated that there is no evidence that the UK is institutionally racist.

title: Meghan and Harry weren't married before public wedding, archbishop says
description: The Archbishop of Canterbury, Justin Welby, has confirmed that the Duke and Duchess of Sussex were not married prior to their televised wedding, countering a claim made by the duchess in the couple's bombshell interview with Oprah Winfrey.

title: The Americans who bought a house in Italy over the internet
description: How many of us have been sitting at home, seen a dreamy picture of a foreign country, and started planning our life there?

title: He should be on the frontline of the pandemic response. Instead, he is facing deportation
description: Few would envy Britain's embattled National Health Service (NHS) workers over the past year. One of the world's worst Covid-19 tolls has meant grueling shifts, danger, and workplaces full of grief and trauma.

title: Pfizer/BioNTech says its Covid-19 vaccine is 100% effective and well tolerated in adolescents
description: Clinical trial results of Pfizer/BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine showed its efficacy is 100% and it is well tolerated in youths ages 12 to 15, the companies said Wednesday.

title: Analysis: Biden's infrastructure plan is no joke
description: President Joe Biden's infrastructure plan is no joke.

title: Dangerous Covid variant wreaks havoc in parts of Europe
description: A dangerous coronavirus variant is already wreaking havoc in other parts of the world and an expert says it's critical the US sticks with safety measures during the next few months to be able to beat another surge and keep people safe.

title: CNN speaks to parents of children in vaccine trial
description: Pfizer and Moderna have begun testing their vaccines on children 6 months through 11 years old. CNN's Gary Tuchman reports.

title: Deliveroo shares plunge 30% in London IPO
description: Deliveroo shares fell as much as 30% in the company's highly anticipated London IPO on Wednesday, wiping out roughly £2.3 billion ($3.2 billion) in market value and dealing a blow to the city's renewed efforts to attract tech company listings.

title: French President Macron under pressure to lock down as Covid-19 hospitalizations soar
description: French President Emmanuel Macron is expected to tighten coronavirus restrictions on Wednesday as case numbers and admissions to intensive care units soar across France, where the government has been resisting a third nationwide lockdown.

title: BBC moves its China correspondent to Taiwan as tensions with Beijing grow
description: The British Broadcasting Corporation has moved its China correspondent to Taiwan from Beijing as the news organization comes under increasing pressure over its reporting in the country.

title: Iconic band holds live shows in New Zealand with no restrictions
description: Playing to massive audiences in New Zealand during their "To the Island" tour, iconic band Crowded House is reminding everyone what life was like before the pandemic. Neil Finn and Nick Seymour talk to CNN's John Vause about their return to the stage.

title: NBA team 'shaken, but unharmed' after plane forced into emergency landing
description: Players and staff of NBA team Utah Jazz were left "shaken, but unharmed" after a bird strike forced the plane they were on to make an emergency landing on Tuesday.

title: 14 countries and WHO chief accuse China of withholding data from pandemic origins investigation
description: It was supposed to offer insight into the origins of the Covid-19 pandemic. But since its release on Tuesday, the long-awaited World Health Organization investigation has drawn criticism from governments around the world over accusations it is incomplete and lacks transparency.

title: Children among the dead and injured in Myanmar military airstrikes, say activists
description: Children were among those killed and injured in airstrikes by Myanmar's military on an ethnic rebel-controlled area in the country's southeast, a humanitarian aid group said Tuesday, as junta forces stepped up their offensive in the region.

title: Older adults begin to catch up on all that they missed during the pandemic after Covid-19 vaccinations
description: With a mix of relief and caution, older adults fully vaccinated against Covid-19 are moving out into the world and resuming activities put on hold during the pandemic.

title: This country is offering free vaccine shots to foreigners
description: Serbia is becoming a regional vaccination hub as it has so much vaccine, it's even offering free shots to foreigners. CNN's Fred Pleitgen reports from the country's biggest vaccination center in Belgrade.

title: Strongman: A marathon like no other
description: Many have completed a marathon, but no-one has done anything like Michael Miraglia's Strongman Marathon.

title: The UAE's tiny lunar rover will face big challenges on the moon
description: Last month, the United Arab Emirates became the first country in the Arab world to put a spacecraft into orbit around Mars. But as it celebrates the achievement of its Hope probe, a group of Emirati scientists is already engaged in another historic feat: building a lunar rover.

title: Firefighter, 9-year-old and teens give powerful testimony in Derek Chauvin trial
With an eye on history, Biden moves on big, bold and progressive infrastructure package
Two US Capitol Police officers sue Trump and say he should be held responsible for January 6 attack
description: Two US Capitol Police officers who say they were injured during the January 6 insurrection are suing former President Donald Trump for inciting the crowd.

title: Recreational marijuana will be legal in New York after lawmakers pass bill. Cuomo says he'll sign it
description: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said Tuesday he plans to sign a bill that would allow recreational marijuana use after the state Senate and Assembly voted to approve the legislation.

title: Bolsonaro will replace all three top military chiefs in historic first
description: The top commanders of Brazil's Armed Forces are stepping down -- marking the first time in Brazil´s history that a president will replace all three military chiefs at once.

title: Rep. Matt Gaetz denies relationship with 17-year-old and claims extortion attempt
description: Rep. Matt Gaetz on Tuesday denied that he had a sexual relationship with a 17-year-old after the New York Times reported that, according to its sources, the Justice Department was investigating a possible sexual relationship with the girl and whether he paid for her to travel with him.

title: G. Gordon Liddy, convicted Watergate conspirator, dies at 90
description: G. Gordon Liddy, a former FBI agent who worked for the reelection committee for President Richard Nixon and an infamous figure in the Watergate scandal, has died at age 90, his son confirmed to CNN.

title: Mama bear has paws full getting cubs across road
description: A mama bear hilariously herds uncooperative cubs across road. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports human mothers can relate.

title: Firefighter, 9-year-old and teens give powerful testimony at Chauvin trial
description: • Analysis: Outside the courtroom, the trial over Floyd death is seen as a test to the US itself

title: Swiss ambassador to US allegedly assaulted in Washington residence
description: An intruder gained entry to the Swiss ambassador's residence in Washington, DC, on Monday afternoon and assaulted the ambassador, according to a statement filed in federal district court by the responding Secret Service officer.

title: A man making a video about Philadelphia's gun violence was shot and killed on the job
description: A Philadelphia man working on a video about the city's gun violence became a victim of the story while on the job.

title: Woman gasped when she saw this painting behind Georgia governor
description: CNN's Don Lemon speaks to Kimberly Wallace, whose family worked at the plantation that was featured behind Governor Brian Kemp while he was signing the new bill that puts some restrictions on voting in Georgia.

title: 65-year-old Asian woman kicked while on ground in graphic video in New York
description: The New York Police Department is investigating what they say is a "hate crime assault" against a 65-year-old Asian woman who was punched and kicked in midtown Manhattan by an attacker who allegedly made anti-Asian statements toward her, according to the police.

title: Newly discovered T. rex lookalike with an unusual skull terrorized Patagonia 80 million years ago
description: Paleontologists in Argentina have identified a previously unknown species of dinosaur that would have used its huge claws, powerful bite and keen sense of hearing to hunt prey in Patagonia 80 million years ago.

title: Minnesota Supreme Court overturns a felony rape conviction because the woman voluntarily got intoxicated
description: The Minnesota Supreme Court overturned a felony rape conviction in a ruling last week because the woman was intoxicated by her own will during the alleged assault.
